title: [Blighted Forest]
description: A low ground fog drifts between the thick boles of trees, cloaking the trunks with silvery haze.  Little undergrowth has penetrated this part of the wood.  A few large boulders sit between the oaks, and as the fog eddies around them, they momentarily take on the appearance of living creatures lurking in the shadows.
